name: RAGE Package Format File
summary: An RPF file is a game data archive used by various Rockstar Games titles such as Grand Theft Auto V and Red Dead Redemption 2. It stores game assets, such as 3D character models, textures, audio, and scripts in the RAGE Package Format (RPF), named after the Rockstar Advanced Game Engine (RAGE) that powers many Rockstar games. RPF files bundle multiple assets into a single, compressed file, helping the game load and manage content efficiently.
